backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an added banner image on the Home Page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short functional descriptions of each component or page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for all site pages and renders RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing navigation, main outlet, and footer with dynamic year and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus and active-link highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider handling identity loading, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining darker copper/bronze theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry mounting React, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DivisionsPage.tsx: Renders a hero section and cards describing each Brotherhood division with images and text. Focuses on Forge, Archive, and other divisions with themed visuals.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Defines structured lore sections about Texhoma, Colt Mercer, and the origins of the Copper Grid using cards and rich text content. Uses an array of history sections rendered in sequence.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero banner, mission summary, and feature cards linking to ranks, divisions, and other site areas. Emphasizes visual branding and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoPage.tsx: Shows a gallery-style page featuring the Tâ€‘10 power armor and accessories with images organized in cards. Includes a hero header and detailed item sections.
frontend/src/pages/RanksPage.tsx: Provides a detailed hierarchy of Brotherhood ranks using cards and categorized sections. Lists responsibilities and traits for leadership and other rank groups.
frontend/src/pages/UniformArmorVariantsB: Outlines armor and uniform variants for each rank using cards and bullet points. Focuses on High Conductor, Conductor, and additional rank-specific equipment.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, existing features, pending feature requests, and project configuration state.
